overview: The AI system has been tasked with transforming a simple app into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This transformation involves a comprehensive overhaul of the app, including the removal of the existing counter feature, and the implementation of new features such as an authentication flow, profile setup, homepage layout, and booking flows. The app will follow a dark theme UI and use the Stacked architecture for state management.
key_events: Removal of the existing counter feature
Implementation of a comprehensive authentication flow
Creation of a profile setup flow
Design of a new homepage layout
Development of booking flows including one-way, multi-stop, and hourly bookings
Adoption of the Stacked architecture for state management
Introduction of a dark theme UI
